complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Review and Rating System task into 5 subtasks, including review data model implementation, submission form with validation, review display components, rating calculations, and moderation features. complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the MUX Integration for Video Uploads task into 5 subtasks, including MUX API setup, upload component implementation, processing status tracking, playback component, and error handling. complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Social Graph Implementation task into 6 subtasks, including follow/unfollow functionality, activity feed implementation, user discovery features, notification system, profile integration, and privacy controls. complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Comments and Likes System task into 4 subtasks, including unified comment component development, likes functionality implementation, moderation tools, and notification integration. complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires creating a unified system that works across multiple content types with features like nested replies, markdown support, and user mentions. It involves real-time updates, moderation capabilities, and integration with the notification system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Search and Discovery Features task into 5 subtasks, including global search implementation, advanced filtering system, recommendation engine, trending content algorithms, and search history functionality. complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Responsive UI Implementation task into 4 subtasks, including responsive layout system, mobile-specific navigation, accessibility implementation, and cross-device testing. complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While primarily frontend-focused, this task requires comprehensive work across all application components to ensure proper display and functionality on all device sizes. The accessibility requirements add complexity requiring specialized knowledge and testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Performance Optimization task into 5 subtasks, including image optimization implementation, code splitting and lazy loading, caching strategy development, database query optimization, and performance monitoring setup. complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Performance optimization spans frontend and backend with multiple technical approaches including image processing, code splitting, caching, database optimization, and monitoring. Each area requires specialized knowledge and careful implementation to avoid regressions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Deployment and CI/CD Setup task into 4 subtasks, including Vercel project configuration, environment management, CI/CD pipeline implementation, and monitoring/error tracking setup.
